AppFooter.tagline: Empowering farmers, restoring ecosystems, and feeding the world sustainably.

online.title: You're back online!
online.description: Any pending changes will now be synced.

offline.title: You are currently offline
offline.description: Your changes will be saved and synced when you reconnect.

syncing.title: Syncing Offline Changes
syncing.description: {count, plural, one {# action is} other {# actions are}} being uploaded.

synced.title: Sync Complete
synced.description: All your offline changes have been saved to the server.

syncFailed.title: Sync Failed
syncFailed.description: Could not sync offline changes. Will retry later.

queued.title: Action Queued
queued.description: Your change has been saved and will sync when online.

recoverPage.title: Social Account Recovery
recoverPage.description: Regain access to your account securely using your network.
recoverPage.step1: Enter your phone number to start a recovery session.
recoverPage.step2: Show the temporary QR code to a trusted DamDoh friend.
recoverPage.step3: Once they confirm, you'll regain access to your account.
recoverPage.scanDescription: Have a trusted contact in your DamDoh network scan this temporary QR code to verify your identity.
recoverPage.scanNote: This code is valid for 10 minutes.

hero.title: Transforming Agriculture for a Vibrant Planet with {appName}
hero.subtitle: The global platform empowering farmers, restoring biodiversity, and creating sustainable farm-to-fork supply chains.

features.title: A Connected Ecosystem for Agriculture
features.subtitle: DamDoh brings together all the tools and communities you need to thrive.

networking.title: Smart Networking
networking.description: Connect with farmers, buyers, and experts across the globe.

marketplace.title: Global Marketplace
marketplace.description: Buy and sell products and services directly and transparently.

forums.title: Knowledge Forums
forums.description: Share knowledge and learn from a global community of experts.

talent.title: Talent Exchange
talent.description: Offer or find agricultural services and expertise.

forWho.title: Built for the Entire Agricultural Ecosystem
forWho.description: Whether you're a smallholder farmer, a global enterprise, or an expert in between, DamDoh provides the tools to grow and succeed.

farmers.title: Farmers
farmers.description: Increase yield, access new markets, and adopt sustainable practices.

buyers.title: Buyers & Processors
buyers.description: Source high-quality, traceable products directly from the source.

experts.title: Experts & Service Providers
experts.description: Offer your expertise and services to a global audience.

forWho.imageAlt: A diverse group of agricultural people collaborating together

cta.title: Ready to Transform Agriculture?
cta.subtitle: Join the DamDoh community today and become part of the movement to create a more sustainable, equitable, and resilient food system for all.

hero.title: Empowering Farmers, Restoring the Planet
hero.subtitle: At DamDoh, we believe that the future of our planet rests in the hands of its smallest farmers.

vision.title: Farmers as Stewards of the Earth
vision.p1: DamDoh was born from lived experience with the immense, interwoven challenges faced by smallholder farmers worldwide: poverty, market exclusion, family crises, migration, and loss of cultural ties to the land.
vision.p2: These challenges don’t just harm individual farmers — they erode ecosystems, accelerate global warming, and destabilize food systems for everyone.

challenge.title: The Challenge: A Broken System, A Warming Planet
challenge.description: Our food comes through a supply chain riddled with vulnerabilities:

solution.title: Our Solution: A Global “Super App” for a Restored Planet
solution.description: DamDoh is a smart, integrated digital platform designed to empower farmers as stewards of biodiversity and catalysts of climate action:

beyondTechnology.title: Beyond Technology: A Global Hub for Restoration

p2p.title: Farmer-to-Farmer
p2p.content: Sharing indigenous knowledge and regenerative techniques across borders.

p2b.title: Farmer-to-Buyer
p2b.content: Linking farmers to buyers committed to biodiversity and climate goals.

p2e.title: Farmer-to-Expert
p2e.content: Providing direct advice from agronomists, ecologists, and researchers.

p2w.title: Farmer-to-World
p2w.content: Partnering with NGOs, governments, and cooperatives to scale impact.

commitment.title: Our Commitment: Restoring Hope, Land, and Livelihoods
commitment.p1: At DamDoh, we see farmers not only as food producers but as guardians of the earth — capable of turning degraded fields into thriving, biodiverse landscapes.
commitment.p2: By empowering smallholders with knowledge, tools, and fair markets, we help them earn more, restore more, and lead their communities toward a sustainable, dignified future.
commitment.p3: When farmers flourish, biodiversity thrives. When biodiversity thrives, the planet heals. Together, we can transform agriculture into a force for good — restoring ecosystems, cooling the climate, and ensuring abundance for generations to come.

contactPage.title: Contact Us
contactPage.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Reach out with any questions or feedback.

sendMessage.title: Send us a Message
sendMessage.note: We'll get back to you as soon as possible.

careers.title: Careers at DamDoh
careers.subtitle: Join our mission to build a sustainable future for agriculture.

whyWorkWithUs.title: Why Work With Us?
whyWorkWithUs.intro: We're a passionate, mission-driven team dedicated to making a real-world impact. We offer:
whyWorkWithUs.point1: A collaborative and innovative work environment.
whyWorkWithUs.point2: Opportunities to work on cutting-edge technology in Agri-Tech.
whyWorkWithUs.point3: A chance to directly impact the livelihoods of farmers globally.
whyWorkWithUs.point5: A commitment to professional growth and development.

noOpenings.title: No Current Openings
noOpenings.content1: We're always looking for talented individuals. If you're passionate about our mission, feel free to send your resume to <emailLink>careers@damdoh.org</emailLink>.

job1.title: Senior Frontend Engineer (Next.js)
job1.description: Build and maintain our user-facing web applications, ensuring a high-quality, performant, and accessible user experience.

job2.title: AI/ML Engineer (Genkit)
job2.description: Develop and deploy AI models for crop diagnosis, market analysis, and personalized recommendations using our Genkit-based infrastructure.

job3.title: Community Manager (East Africa)
job3.description: Engage with our user community, foster knowledge sharing, and gather feedback to drive product improvements for the East African region.

communityGuidelines.title: Community Guidelines
communityGuidelines.subtitle: Fostering a respectful, collaborative, and trustworthy environment for all.
communityGuidelines.intro: Welcome to the DamDoh community! We are building a global network based on trust and mutual respect. To ensure a positive experience for everyone, please adhere to the following guidelines:

respectful.title: Be Respectful & Constructive
respectful.description: Engage in discussions with courtesy. Disagreements are fine, but personal attacks, harassment, hate speech, or bullying will not be tolerated. Focus on constructive criticism and collaborative problem-solving.

authentic.title: Be Authentic & Honest
authentic.description: Represent yourself and your products truthfully. Do not post misleading information, create fake profiles, or engage in deceptive practices. Transparency is the foundation of trust in our supply chain.

relevant.title: Stay Relevant & On-Topic
relevant.description: Keep your posts and comments relevant to the forum topic or marketplace listing. Spam, irrelevant promotions, or off-topic content may be removed to keep discussions focused and valuable.

fairTrade.title: Uphold Fair Trade Practices
fairTrade.description: Conduct all transactions and negotiations ethically. Do not engage in price-fixing, fraudulent activities, or attempts to exploit other members of the community. All dealings should be fair and transparent.

sustainable.title: Promote Sustainable & Ethical Practices
sustainable.description: Our community values sustainability. Share and promote practices that are environmentally sound, socially responsible, and economically viable. Avoid promoting harmful or unethical agricultural practices.

reporting.title: Reporting Violations
reporting.content: If you see content that violates these guidelines, please report it to our moderation team by flagging the content or emailing us at <emailLink>support@damdoh.org</emailLink>.

communityGuidelines.conclusion: By participating in the DamDoh community, you agree to these guidelines. We reserve the right to remove content and suspend accounts that violate these principles. Thank you for helping us build a positive and impactful ecosystem.

helpCenterPage.title: Help Center
helpCenterPage.subtitle: Your guide to navigating the DamDoh platform.

troubleshooting.description: Common issues and how to resolve them.

stillNeedHelp.title: Still need help?
stillNeedHelp.description: If you can't find what you're looking for, our support team is happy to assist.

industryNewsPage.title: Industry News
industryNewsPage.description: Stay informed with the latest trends, research, and policy updates in the agricultural sector.

noNews.title: No News Found
noNews.description: Check back later for the latest updates from the agricultural industry.

news1.title: Global Grain Prices Surge Amidst Supply Chain Disruptions
news1.excerpt: A new report from AgriMarket Insights indicates a sharp increase in global grain prices, driven by logistical bottlenecks and changing weather patterns.

news2.title: EU Implements Stricter Regulations on Sustainable Packaging
news2.excerpt: Food exporters to the European Union must now comply with new, stricter regulations aimed at reducing plastic waste in food packaging.

news3.title: Breakthrough in Drought-Resistant Maize Varieties
news3.excerpt: Researchers announce a significant breakthrough in developing new maize varieties that show remarkable resilience to drought conditions, offering hope for arid regions.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: Welcome to DamDoh. We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy. If you have any questions or concerns about our policy, or our practices with regards to your personal information, please contact us.

whatInfoWeCollect.heading: 1. WHAT INFORMATION DO WE COLLECT?
whatInfoWeCollect.content: We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you register on the platform, express an interest in obtaining information about us or our products and services, when you participate in activities on the platform, or otherwise when you contact us. This includes names, phone numbers, email addresses, mailing addresses, job titles, contact preferences, and other similar information.

howWeUseInfo.heading: 2. HOW DO WE USE YOUR INFORMATION?
howWeUseInfo.content: We use personal information collected via our platform for a variety of business purposes described below. We process your personal information for these purposes in reliance on our legitimate business interests, in order to enter into or perform a contract with you, with your consent, and/or for compliance with our legal obligations.

willInfoBeShared.heading: 3. WILL YOUR INFORMATION BE SHARED WITH ANYONE?
willInfoBeShared.content: We only share information with your consent, to comply with laws, to provide you with services, to protect your rights, or to fulfill business obligations. We may process or share your data that we hold based on the following legal basis: Consent, Legitimate Interests, Performance of a Contract, Legal Obligations.

cookiesAndTracking.heading: 4. DO WE USE COOKIES AND OTHER TRACKING TECHNOLOGIES?
cookiesAndTracking.content: We may use cookies and similar tracking technologies (like web beacons and pixels) to access or store information. Specific information about how we use such technologies and how you can refuse certain cookies is set out in our Cookie Notice.

howLongWeKeepInfo.heading: 5. HOW LONG DO WE KEEP YOUR INFORMATION?
howLongWeKeepInfo.content: We will only keep your personal information for as long as it is necessary for the purposes set out in this privacy policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law (such as tax, accounting or other legal requirements).

howWeKeepInfoSafe.heading: 6. HOW DO WE KEEP YOUR INFORMATION SAFE?
howWeKeepInfoSafe.content: We have implemented appropriate technical and organizational security measures designed to protect the security of any personal information we process. However, despite our safeguards and efforts to secure your information, no electronic transmission over the Internet or information storage technology can be guaranteed to be 100% secure.

minors.heading: 7. DO WE COLLECT INFORMATION FROM MINORS?
minors.content: We do not knowingly solicit data from or market to children under 18 years of age. By using the platform, you represent that you are at least 18 or that you are the parent or guardian of such a minor and consent to such minor dependent’s use of the platform.

privacyRights.heading: 8. WHAT ARE YOUR PRIVACY RIGHTS?
privacyRights.content: In some regions (like the European Economic Area and the United Kingdom), you have certain rights under applicable data protection laws. These may include the right (i) to request access and obtain a copy of your personal information, (ii) to request rectification or erasure; (iii) to restrict the processing of your personal information; and (iv) if applicable, to data portability.

controlsForDoNotTrack.heading: 9. CONTROLS FOR DO-NOT-TRACK FEATURES
controlsForDoNotTrack.content: Most web browsers and some mobile operating systems and mobile applications include a Do-Not-Track (“DNT”) feature or setting you can activate to signal your privacy preference not to have data about your online browsing activities monitored and collected. At this stage no uniform technology standard for recognizing and implementing DNT signals has been finalized. As such, we do not currently respond to DNT browser signals or any other mechanism that automatically communicates your choice not to be tracked online.

updatesToNotice.heading: 10. DO WE MAKE UPDATES TO THIS NOTICE?
updatesToNotice.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. The updated version will be indicated by an updated “Revised” date and the updated version will be effective as soon as it is accessible. We encourage you to review this privacy policy frequently to be informed of how we are protecting your information.
